name: wordpress-integration
title: Wordpress Integration
description: Connect a Wordpress blog to a VTEX store

endpoint.title: Wordpress URL
endpoint.description: Enter the URL of your Wordpress installation in the form https://www.example.com/ (Only HTTPS is supported)

apiPath.title: Custom API path
apiPath.description: The app expects to access the Wordpress API at the above domain using the path 'wp-json/wp/v2/' but you may override this by entering a different path here. It should have a slash at the end but not at the beginning.

titleTag.title: Title tag for blog homepage
titleTag.description: Will also be appended to inner blog pages

displayShowRowsText.title: Display 'Posts Per Page' in Pagination
displayShowRowsText.description: In the Pagination component, display the 'Posts Per Page' text

ignoreRobotsMetaTag.title: Ignore Yoast SEO Robots Meta Tag
ignoreRobotsMetaTag.description: Ignore the robots meta tag that is provided by the Yoast SEO plugin. This option only applies if you are using the Yoast SEO plugin in your WordPress installation

initializeSitemap.title: Create Sitemap Entries
initializeSitemap.description: Create the initial sitemap entries (/blog-posts and /blog-categories) in the stores root sitemap. If setting up the app for the first time, leave this enabled so the sitemap is updated with these entries. If this is not the first time you have set up the Wordpress app, ensure the sitemap entries are not in your sitemap before changing this setting, it could result in duplicate sitemap entries.

filterByCategories.title: Filter by categories
filterByCategories.description: Shows a dropdown containing all categories allowing you to filter your posts by the selected category.

filterByTags.title: Filter by tags
filterByTags.description: Shows a dropdown containing all tags allowing you to filter your posts by the selected tag.

filterByDate.title: Filter by date
filterByDate.description: Shows date fields to filter your posts by a single date or date range.
